## ScaleType enum

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare enum ScaleType 
```

## Enumeration Members

|  Member | Value | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  Linear | <code>&quot;linear&quot;</code> | Maps using a linear transform. |
|  Log | <code>&quot;log&quot;</code> | Maps with a log transform. Useful for wide data ranges, but cannot handle 0 values. |
|  Quantile | <code>&quot;quantile&quot;</code> | This creates a set of quantile bins to partition the data into, with an aim for equal size bins to smooth out the scale. |
